title: Doak's revival, strength in depth & Ulster's form - Talking points from Ireland squad
description: Andy Farrell has named his Ireland squad for the 2026 Six Nations, but what are the big talking points from his selection?

title: What does the future hold for LIV Golf after Koepka exit?
description: With the PGA Tour going on the offensive, how hard LIV's paymasters fight to keep Bryson DeChambeau may well go a long way to dictating the future credibility of its series, writes Dan Roan.

title: 'I'm a scary sight' - Northampton's 23-stone, one-meal man
description: Northampton lock JJ van der Mescht's gainline power and 23-stone frame is fuelled by just one meal a day.

title: What we learned from Afcon 2025
description: After chaotic scenes in the Africa Cup of Nations final, BBC Sport Africa explores what else we learned from just under a month of competition in Morocco.

title: 'Good signs' or just buying time? Spurs remain divided on Frank future
description: Many Tottenham fans have already lost faith in Thomas Frank - but did Tuesday's 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund give cause for optimism?

title: USMNT World Cup big board 4.0: Pochettino's roster coming into focus
description: We're less than five months away from the USMNT's World Cup opener, and with the clock ticking down, Mauricio Pochettino's squad is coming into focus.

title: 'Battered in Bodo' - is this more than just a blip for Man City?
description: Manchester City suffered their very own "hell of a beating" moment in Norway on Tuesday - now Pep Guardiola and his players must turn around their fortunes in an increasingly trying January.

title: NFL play-offs - how final four can make it to Super Bowl
description: We look at what the four teams left standing need to do to make it to Super Bowl 60 and the key factors in Sunday's Conference  Championship games.

title: The day I discovered the Everton contract Revie never signed
description: This is the story of how an unsigned contract that lay hidden in a bungalow for more than 50 years could have changed the course of English football.

title: Rejections, depression & promise to his mum - Thiago's route to top
description: Igor Thiago's route to the Premier League has been far from straightforward - BBC Sport charts the rise of Brentford's record-breaking Brazilian striker.

title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
description: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.
